import React from 'react' import s from './MyPosts.module.css' import Post from './Post/Post' const MyPosts = () => { let postData = [ {id: '1', text: 'Hi'}, {id: '2', text: 'How are you'}, {id: '3', text: 'I`m fine'}, {id: '4', text: 'Ana'}, {id: '5', text: 'Sergei'}, {id: '6', text: 'Julia'}, ]; return (
My post
) }; export default MyPosts
